math::float3x3 Class Reference
[Mathematical support classes]

#include <float3x3.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

3x3 column-major matrix of scalar type float.

NOTE: The class behaves like C basic types what it comes to initialization so default constructor leaves the components to unspecified value.


Public Types

enum  { ROWS = 3, COLUMNS = 3, SIZE = 9 }
